Details 4 people responded Event by South Island Mountain Bike Society - SIMBS 1 Hartland Ave, Victoria, BC, Canada, British Columbia V8W 3R8 Duration: 14 days Public · Anyone on or off Facebook SIMBS December Hartland Distance Challenge! Ride Trails, Earn Badges, Win Prizes! Test the limits of your legs around Hartland and put in the distance to win prizes! Challenge Open December 01-31 / 2024 Challenge 1/3 Ride 10km of Hartland trails collectively throughout December! Challenge 1 Trailforks Badge: https://www.trailforks.com/badges/view/156263/ Challenge 2/3 Ride 50km of Hartland trails collectively throughout December! Challenge 2 Trailforks Badge: https://www.trailforks.com/badges/view/156264/ Challenge 3/3 Ride 100km of Hartland trails collectively throughout December! Challenge 3 Trailforks Badge: https://www.trailforks.com/badges/view/156265/ The rules are simple: 1. Get a SIMBS membership / Check your membership number here: http://simbs.com/join 2.Signup here on Eventbrite: https://www.eventbrite.ca/.../simbs-december-hartland... 3. Ride the Distance Challenges, Record your rides on Trailforks to earn badges and you'll be automatically entered! 4. Complete one challenge - Get entered to win a 25$ Gift card to Gold Stream Bikes! 5. Complete all three challenges and be entered to a Grand Prize! Questions? email: staff@simbs.com Prizes will be drawn on January 02!
